source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a stunning time-lapse video of a thunderstorm at night. The clouds billow and shift, illuminated from within by flashes of lightning. Stars and what appear to be satellites or planes streak across the dark, expansive sky.

source_caption_data.initial_feedback:

There is no " what appear to be satellites or planes streak"
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The time-lapse video begins during the day and transitions to nighttime. The description inaccurately mentions "what appear to be satellites or planes streaking" across the sky, which is not present in the video.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The time-lapse video begins during the day and transitions to nighttime. The description inaccurately mentions "what appear to be satellites or planes streaking" across the sky, which is not present in the video.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This captivating time-lapse video captures a thunderstorm transitioning from day to night. The clouds billow and shift, illuminated from within by flashes of lightning, against the backdrop of a dark, expansive sky.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This captivating time-lapse video captures a thunderstorm transitioning from day to night. The clouds billow and shift, illuminated from within by flashes of lightning, against the backdrop of a dark, expansive sky.

generated_critique: The caption inaccurately states the video takes place at night, as it begins during the day. The description of satellites or planes streaking across the sky is also incorrect, as this does not happen in the video.
